description: Led architecture and development of enterprise observability platform supporting 1,000+ production applications, improving monitoring coverage and system reliability at scale
Led a team of 5 engineers delivering end-to-end features across frontend, backend, and CI/CD pipelines, enabling faster iteration and higher deployment confidence in a distributed Agile environment
Defined technical roadmap and architecture standards across multiple product lines, aligning engineering efforts with long-term platform goals
Drove cross-team alignment on observability best practices, standardizing tooling and instrumentation across engineering organizations
Designed observability compliance platform (Angular, TypeScript, Spring Boot) that graded application maturity and provided automated remediation
Architected and deployed production ML system achieving 99% accuracy in automated incident classification, using AWS Lambda, Step Functions, and EventBridge
Reduced technical debt by automating SaaS platform governance using Python-based Kubernetes CronJobs to enforce reporting and enterprise standards
Built executive-facing observability dashboard (React, Redux, Python/Flask) visualizing degradation patterns across 500+ customer-facing critical applications
Drove AIOps transformation by migrating from IBM Netcool to BigPanda's ML-driven event correlation platform
Developed a metadata enrichment pipeline that correlated telemetry across multiple systems to generate real-time application topology views
Mentored 200+ senior engineering students through capstone projects, providing individualized development guidance and technical design reviews
Delivered guest lectures on containerized cloud architecture covering Docker, Kubernetes, and cloud-native deployment patterns
Conducted comprehensive review sessions on software architecture and cloud systems, enhancing student understanding of enterprise-grade design principles
Offered professional insights from corporate enterprise experience, bridging the gap between academic learning and real-world software engineering
Demonstrated leadership through live lectures and engaging technical discussions, strengthening communication skills across a cohort of 200+ undergraduate seniors
Modernized legacy ASP.NET application by refactoring to MVC architecture (TypeScript, React, C#), improving maintainability and user experience for an enterprise EDI dashboard
Automated API validation using NUnit, Azure Key Vault, and Azure Pipelines, achieving 100% test coverage across 60+ REST and SOAP services on a daily scheduled run
Orchestrated the final phase of the SDLC by building an NUnit testing suite that generated automated email reports validating every API consumed by the enterprise
Contributed to design and development of enterprise point-of-sale software, delivering 3 production ordering features with a focus on performance, security, and usability
Created and maintained comprehensive technical documentation covering every feature of the project, ensuring compliance with client specifications
Collaborated cross-functionally with senior engineers to ship bug fixes and performance improvements to a live production system
